title: CCI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Consultant Posts
description: The Cement Corporation of India Limited (CCI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Consultant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree and 10th pass can apply for the CCI Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appl...
